description.fr: Former le riz en triangles compacts avec les mains humides pour créer les onigiri traditionnels.
description.en: Shape rice into compact triangles with wet hands to create traditional onigiri.
description.ko: 젖은 손으로 쌀을 조밀한 삼각형으로 만들어 전통적인 오니기리를 만드세요.

tips.fr:
Former des triangles avec les mains humides
Presser fermement pour que ça tienne
Garder les mains humides
tips.en:
Shape triangles with wet hands
Press firmly so it holds together
Keep hands wet
tips.ko:
젖은 손으로 삼각형을 만드세요
잘 붙도록 세게 누르세요
손을 젖게 유지하세요
